content.rendered: If you are already a ViaGen Pets client, you may make payment on any invoice here, including storage fees for Genetic Preservation (GP)

excerpt.rendered: If you are already a ViaGen Pets client, you may make payment on any invoice here, including storage fees for Genetic Preservation (GP).
